name: Arumba Cleaner
description:
A game about a home robot who cleans the house. Created for the 2019 Global Game Jam, "What Home Means to You". I may continue development on this game in the future.

Some tracking blockers may prevent the game from running properly. If the game does not load, try whitelisting the page.

Controls:
A/D or Arrow Keys - Move Around
Space - Interact

Made using Godot and Krita.
